641b6b2c0689fc35d6a3d77a7215fd1d9ce2a2b8.commitMessage: Issue #5812: Rename all utility classes to xxxxUtil

82bc23f45d7d57dfa26d1a1d4ec0f7dfcd88abb2.commitMessage: Pull #4328: moved variables inside if blocks to reduce execution time

0d8e93ce79ea33b72b3e904d8796984271ee3d8d.commitMessage: minor: enforce FinalLocalVariableCheck on checkstyle code

cdf3e56bacd3895262af8a1df9ca5c81f4071970.commitMessage: Utils class has been splitted to CommonUtils and TokenUtils. Issue #1898

bf6735ce4bf833170d19d91922d9b4d17aa4aefc.commitMessage:
Use StringBuilder to concatenate strings. #1555

Fixes `StringReplaceableByStringBuffer` inspection violations.

Description:
Reports any variables declared as java.lang.String which are repeatedly appended to. Such variables may be more efficiently declared as java.lang.StringBuffer or java.lang.StringBuilder.

a2b8be14bb1230f1b184701bae8bcc7af102bb25.commitMessage: Fix PMD violations from SimplifyStartsWith rule, issue #949

c0446a825514ea0279b8c22f633f2c4e3c73dc1f.commitMessage:
Fix PMD violations from UseVarargs rule, issue #999

The changes are fully backward-compatible. Method with vararg can be invoked both using array and list of parameters.

8d800ef546e11c6d593154f4071e39cdc4f66f34.commitMessage: Enhanced ImportOrder  to support using regular expressions for defining groups. Thanks to Martin von Gagern for patch #2782118.

139609ac5d073ecb04381466f075f174b0aec8c9.commitMessage: Fixed ImportOrder to have the sort behaviour as in release 5.0. (bug #2952881). Thanks to Steve McKay for patch #2953936.

efccc132cea8ce1efad0e5318b8419cc603f8957.commitMessage: Enhanced ImportOrder check to support wildcard ('*') groups. Thanks to Steve McKay for patch #2891032.
